audio

Interface AudioMaster

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AudioMasterBuffered

    public interface AudioMaster
    Manages the audio used in OpenAL library that represent 3 dimentional sound engine.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    homelleon

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void cleanUp()
      Clean audio buffer and destroy OpenAL context.
      int getBuffer(java.lang.String path)
      Returns auido buffer by path of audio
      java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Integer> getBuffers()
      Returns map of all buffers in Audio Master.
      void init()
      Initialization of Audio Master creating OpenAL context.
      int loadSound(java.lang.String file)
      Loads sound file into audio buffer map and sets key with the name of the file.
      void setListenerData(org.lwjgl.util.vector.Vector3f position)
      Setting position of user in 3 dimentional space.

    • Method Detail

      • init

        void init()
        Initialization of Audio Master creating OpenAL context.

      • getBuffers

        java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Integer> getBuffers()
        Returns map of all buffers in Audio Master.
        Returns:
        Map audio buffers

      • getBuffer

        int getBuffer(java.lang.String path)
        Returns auido buffer by path of audio
        Parameters:
        path - position of audio file
        Returns:
        int buffer ID

      • setListenerData

        void setListenerData(org.lwjgl.util.vector.Vector3f position)
        Setting position of user in 3 dimentional space.
        Parameters:
        position - Vector3f

      • loadSound

        int loadSound(java.lang.String file)
        Loads sound file into audio buffer map and sets key with the name of the file.
        Parameters:
        file - String name of file to load
        Returns:
        int buffer ID of loaded file

      • cleanUp

        void cleanUp()
        Clean audio buffer and destroy OpenAL context.
